name: Polaris (itch) (Gguste, Hugo Frota, Patrick Conde, CeHaga, UFOwen)
name_original: Polaris (itch) (Gguste, Hugo Frota, Patrick Conde, CeHaga, UFOwen)
description:
With the powers of the stars and constellations, Polaris will rescue her friends!
